rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Bathroom

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.name: Bedroom 2

rooms.name: Bedroom 3

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A versatile study room ensuring natural light from the east window, aligning with Vastu for knowledge and creativity.
